alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 10:08PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Windham, northern Tolland, northeastern Hartford, southwestern Worcester, southeastern Hampshire, southeastern Franklin and southeastern Hampden Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1008 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pelham to East Granby. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Springfield, Chicopee, Enfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Windsor, Agawam, West Springfield, Simsbury, Ludlow, Bloomfield, South Hadley, Holden, Southbridge, Auburn, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow and Ellington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
